translated: The newspaper agreed to publish the exclusive interview with Rita Skeeter, in which Harry Potter exhibited his story about Voldemort's return in June 1995 (which increases much sympathy from Harry Potter).
original: Le journal accepte de publier l'interview exclusive de Rita Skeeter, dans laquelle Harry Potter exposait sa version des faits sur le retour de Voldemort en juin 1995 (ce qui accro√Æt beaucoup la sympathie d'Harry Potter).
